data.text: ◄Having a good reputation/Being honored by people► is better than having a lot of money;
There is one thing that is true about both rich people and poor people:
Those who have good sense realize that there is something dangerous ahead, and they avoid it;
The reward that Yahweh gives to those who are humble and who revere him
Because of the things that wicked people do, they have difficulties/troubles that will be like thorns and traps on the roads that they walk on [MET];
If you train/teach children to do what is right,
Rich people rule over poor people harshly,
If you plant corn or rice, corn or rice will grow;
God will bless those who are generous [IDM],
If you get rid of those who make fun of everything that is good,
If you always act sincerely [IDM] and always speak kindly,
Yahweh [SYN] ◄watches over/takes care of► those who have good understanding/sense,
Lazy people remain in their houses;
What ◄wives who commit adultery/immoral women► say to men [MTY] is like a deep pit [MET] into which those men fall;
Children [SYN] naturally do things that are foolish,
Those who oppress poor people in order to become rich,
Now listen [MTY] to what wise people have said;
It will be good to ◄keep these things in your minds/always remember them►,
I want you to trust in Yahweh,
I have written [RHQ] 30 ◄sayings/things that wise people have said►
From them, you will learn what is right and what is true,
It is easy to rob poor people who are helpless and cannot defend themselves, but never do that;
because Yahweh will speak to defend them,
Do not become friends with those who often become angry,
because you might start to act like they do
If someone borrows money,
because if you cannot pay it back,
Do not steal some of your neighbors’ land by removing the boundary lines/markers that your ancestors placed/set.
Know/Learn [RHQ] this about those who do their work very skillfully:
